definition: companionship/fellowship/friendship
friend
friendship/also pr. [yi2]
friendly match/friendly competition
Friendship Store, PRC state-run store originally intended for foreigners, diplomats etc, specializing in selling imported Western goods and quality Chinese crafts
Youyi county in Shuangyashan 雙鴨山|双鸭山[Shuang1 ya1 shan1], Heilongjiang

Auld Lang Syne, Scottish song with lyrics by Robert Burns 羅伯特·伯恩斯|罗伯特·伯恩斯[Luo2 bo2 te4 · Bo2 en1 si1], sung to mark the start of a new year or as a farewell/also rendered 友誼萬歲|友谊万岁[You3 yi4 wan4 sui4] or 友誼天長地久|友谊天长地久[You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3]
pinyin: You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2

definition: see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]
pinyin: You3 yi4 tian1 chang2 di4 jiu3

definition: Mt Friendship, the highest peak of the Altai mountains
see 友誼地久天長|友谊地久天长[You3 yi4 di4 jiu3 tian1 chang2]
relationship that is more than friendship

sentences.english: Other violence occurred at Friendship Road and at Liberation Road, they said.
sentences.chinese: 他們說還有其它的暴力事件發生在友誼路和解放大道。

sentences.english: In the intimate circle of Friendlies, Huanhuan is the big brother.
sentences.chinese: 在體內循環的友誼賽，歡歡是大哥哥。

sentences.english: This is somewhat like platonic cross-sex friendships.
sentences.chinese: 這有點像柏拉圖式的異性友誼。

sentences.english: He said to further enhance friendship, deepen understanding, deepen bilateral cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示要進一步增進友誼，加深理解，深化雙方合作。

sentences.english: The return of the Milu deer is a good example of friendship and cooperation between China and Britain.
sentences.chinese: 麋鹿迴歸是中英兩國友誼和合作的一個很好的例子。

sentences.english: Their friendship dates from college days.
sentences.chinese: 他們的友誼可追溯到大學時代。

sentences.english: Shared laughter creates a bond of friendships.
sentences.chinese: 分享歡笑創造友誼的結合力。

sentences.english: They will become the "torch carriers" for China-ASEAN friendship.
sentences.chinese: 他們將成爲中國和東盟友誼薪火相傳的光明使者。

sentences.english: It shows how a strong friendship can last through the worst possible times.
sentences.chinese: 這說明一份真摯的友誼可以歷苦難而彌堅。

sentences.english: It was my good fortune to be linked with Madame Curie through twenty years of sublime and unclouded friendship.
sentences.chinese: 我幸運地同居裏夫人有20年崇高而真摯的友誼。

sentences.english: He was in a tiny capsule called Friendship 7.
sentences.chinese: 他身處一個叫做友誼7號的小型太空艙。

sentences.english: If, though, this trait is too annoying, end the friendship.
sentences.chinese: 可是如果這種性格太煩人，那就終結友誼。

sentences.english: The great friendship and militant solidarity between the peoples of our two countries are unbreakable.
sentences.chinese: 我們兩國人民的偉大友誼與戰鬥團結是堅不可摧的。

sentences.english: Shanghai Friendship Pencil Sharpener Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 上海友誼卷筆刀有限公司。

sentences.english: Take time to be friendly; it is the road to happiness.
sentences.chinese: 花些時間給友誼，那是幸福之路。

sentences.english: Send to the small gift to express affection, promote the comity .
sentences.chinese: 送小禮品以表達感情，增進友誼。
